about_the_game:
In the future, a technological revolution has brought intelligent robots that now threaten history itself. Your mission: protect the past, present, and future from this robotic menace.





In House of Cards: TD, travel through time and battle robots attempting to alter history. Command historical figures in an innovative tower defense game that blends strategy, character fusion, and luck.

Recruit and Strengthen


Strategically position historical heroes and use character fusion to enhance their abilities. Unlock new characters to expand your defensive options.





  • Innovative Gameplay: Combines tower defense strategy, character fusion, and luck elements.
  • Historical Figures: Includes Imhotep, Ramses II, Socrates, Leonidas, and more.
  • Temporal Challenges: Defend different eras against robotic foes.
  • Special Abilities: Unlock and upgrade unique skills.
  • Pixel Art Style: 2D top-down graphics with a pixelated aesthetic.
  • Character Fusion: Combine identical characters to strengthen them.
  • Variety of Enemies: Face common robots and challenging bosses.
  • Character Unlocking: Use a gacha system to acquire new heroes.
  • Progression: Advance through eras, collect gems, and unlock new characters.
  • Rewards: Complete missions and discover secret characters.
  • Available for Windows: Play on your PC and enjoy all features.





  • Objectives and Goals: Uncover the entire storyline and protect eras from robotic interference.
  • Gaming Experience: Exciting and addictive, with new challenges and discoveries in every phase.

House Of Cards: TD is in early access. Join the project, contribute to development, and get ready for many future updates!
